issue.title: [Rust] Migrate min_large_string -> min_string kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10086](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10086). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the kernels are named 

`min_string`, `max_string`, `max_large_string`, `min_large_string`, but this is no longer needed, as strings are now the same generic struct

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10086?focusedCommentId=17202354) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8263
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8263>
